docs.text: This is an tag This is an tag This is an tag This text will be italic This will also be italic This text will be bold This will also be bold You can combine them Item 1 Item 2 Item 2a Item 2b Item 1 Item 2 Item 3 Item 3a Item 3b Format: http://github.com - automatic! GitHub As Kanye West said: We're living the future so the present is our past. I think you should use an <addr> element here instead. 1 2 3 4 5 function fancyAlert ( arg ) { if ( arg ) { $ . facebox ({ div : '#foo' }) } } [x] @mentions, #refs, links , formatting , and tags supported [x] list syntax required (any unordered or ordered list supported) [x] this is a complete item [ ] this is an incomplete item First Header Second Header Content from cell 1 Content from cell 2 Content in the first column Content in the second column It's very easy to make some words bold and other words italic with Markdown. You can even link to Google!
